mapper.sql: rln_id, user_id, par_user_id, real_name, agent_id, status
mapper.update:
update user_rln
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
par_user_id = #{parUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rln_id = #{rlnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_rln set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, par_user_id = #{parUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rln_id = #{rlnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select rln.rln_id, rln.user_id, rln.par_user_id, info.real_name, rln.agent_id, rln.status, info.category from user_rln rln left join user_info info on rln.user_id=info.user_id where rln.par_user_id = #{parUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
